body: I really hope we're, (if not the first) one of the first sentient/intelligent creatures to get out of our planets gravity well and furthermore our Solar system and later on our local solar star group then to expand through out this galaxy. Mostly because I really wanna just ROFL stomp all the other younger races and just make them obedient to us vie Ascension to a lower form of our level. Then spreading through the galaxy and other local galaxies a type of trap device that pushes em to a form of pre-convertion set up with a number of reconstitutions of biological and technological materials towards full convertion events centered around the main Ascension devices also having them ping back to us an activation of furthure convergence to limited/controlled asension. It would be kinda like dead space/mass effect like just with more general ROFL stomping and less mass death and destruction.
im not afraid to die, SO GIVE ME SOME GODDAMN TRASNLATIONS!!!
